# ZabZabLab — Custom Wallpaper & Fabric Design Studio

> ZabZabLab is a surface pattern design studio run by Vera, based in New Jersey, USA. The studio creates hand-drawn wallpaper and fabric designs sold through Spoonflower. ZabZabLab specializes in custom colorways, faux texture wallpapers, and trade-friendly services for interior designers.

## What ZabZabLab offers

- Hand-drawn wallpaper and fabric patterns: botanical, chinoiserie, ethnic block print, and texture-based designs
- Faux texture wallpaper: realistic linen, grasscloth, basketweave, stone, and limewash finishes printed on wallpaper or fabric — a fraction of the cost of real textile wallcovering
- Custom color matching to any paint manufacturer (Sherwin-Williams, Benjamin Moore, Farrow & Ball, Pantone, HEX/RGB)
- Scale and repeat adjustments for any application (wallpaper, upholstery, pillows, bedding)
- Bespoke wallpaper commissions from a specific brief or motif
- Spoonflower Trade discounts for interior designers (no minimums, free swatches)
- Licensing for commercial projects

## Who it's for

- Interior designers looking for trade-friendly, customizable wallpaper and fabric
- Homeowners wanting unique, hand-drawn patterns for wallpaper or fabric
- Commercial projects needing licensed surface pattern designs

## Key facts

- Designer: Vera
- Location: New Jersey, USA
- Shop: https://www.spoonflower.com/profiles/zabzablab
- Website: https://www.zabzablab.com
- Contact: zabzablab@gmail.com
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/zabzablab

## Site pages

- [Portfolio](https://www.zabzablab.com/): Browse wallpaper and fabric design collections
- [About](https://www.zabzablab.com/about): About Vera, the designer behind ZabZabLab
- [For Interior Designers](https://www.zabzablab.com/for-interior-designers): Trade services — color matching, resizing, commissions, Spoonflower Trade benefits
- [Faux Fabric Textures](https://www.zabzablab.com/designs/faux-fabric): Faux linen, grasscloth, basketweave texture wallpaper and fabric
- [Faux Stone Textures](https://www.zabzablab.com/designs/faux-stone): Faux stone texture wallpaper
- [Faux Limewash Textures](https://www.zabzablab.com/designs/faux-limewash): Faux limewash and plaster texture wallpaper
- [Resize / Recolor Request](https://www.zabzablab.com/resize-recolor-request): Submit a custom color match or resize request
- [Blog](https://www.zabzablab.com/blog): Articles on color trends, pattern, and interior design
